Uses of Class
components.Package

Packages that use Package
Package Description
components  

  • Uses of Package in components

    Subclasses of Package in components
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  NonStandardPackage
    Represents the non-standard size packages.
    class  SmallPackage
    This class represents a small package
    class  StandardPackage
    Class represents packages with varying weights over one kilogram.
    Methods in components that return Package
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Package Truck.getLastPack()
    the function returns the Last Package

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Package> Branch.getListPackages()
    The function return the ListPackages
    java.util.ArrayList<Package> MainOffice.getPackages()
    Get method for packages field
    java.util.ArrayList<Package> Truck.getPackages()
    the function returns the Packages of the truck
    Methods in components with parameters of type Package
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Branch.addPackage​(int index, Package p)
    A function adds package to the packages array By index
    void Branch.addPackage​(Package p)
    A function adds package to the packages list
    void Truck.addPackage​(int index, Package p)
    Add a package to the list of packages by index
    void Truck.addPackage​(Package p)
    Add a package to the list of packages
    boolean StandardTruck.checkCapacityAdd​(Package p, int currentWeight, Status status)
    The function checks whether the dimensions actually match the desired package dimensions
    Truck Branch.checkMovePackage​(Package p, Status status, Address address)
    The function checks the trucks in the list, if the truck is free, changing the status of the package, adding to the transfer history, changing the availability of the truck, adding the package to the truck and updating the time left
    void Branch.collectPackage​(Package p)
    A method that handles the collection / receipt of a package
    void Node.collectPackage​(Package p)
    A method that handles the collection / receipt of a package by the implementing department.
    void NonStandardTruck.collectPackage​(Package p)
    This method handles the collection of a non standard package from a costumer by the truck, the appropriate status of the package is set, a tracking listing is added and the delivery time is calculated
    void StandardTruck.collectPackage​(Package p)
    A method that handles the collection / receipt of a package
    void Van.collectPackage​(Package p)
    This method handles the completion of collection of a package from a costumer by the van, the appropriate status of the package is set, a tracking listing is added and the packaged is removed from the van (it is at the branch now)
    void Branch.deliverPackage​(Package p)
    A method that handles the delivery of the package to the next person in the transfer chain.
    void Node.deliverPackage​(Package p)
    A method that handles the delivery of the package to the next person in the transfer chain.
    void NonStandardTruck.deliverPackage​(Package p)
    This method handles the delivery of a non standard package from the truck to a costumer, the appropriate status of the package is set and a tracking listing is added
    void StandardTruck.deliverPackage​(Package p)
    A method that handles the delivery of the package to the next person in the transfer chain.
    void Van.deliverPackage​(Package p)
    This method handles the delivery of a non standard package from the van to a costumer, the appropriate status of the package is set and a tracking listing is added
    void Branch.removePackage​(Package p)
    The function receives a package and removes it from the list of packages
    void Truck.removePackage​(Package p)
    The function removes the packet sent from the list
